scripts.unit-tests: npm run clean-unit-tests && npm run build-unit-tests && npm run run-unit-tests
scripts.build-ts: npm run clean-ts && npm run build-ts-server && npm run build-ts-client
scripts.check: npm rum lint-errors-only && npm run build-ts && npm run unit-tests
scripts.build-client-dev: npm run build-build && env-cmd -e dev node ./buildScripts/build/buildClient.js
scripts.build-server-dev: npm run build-build && env-cmd -e dev node ./buildScripts/build/buildServer.js
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-build && env-cmd -e dev node ./buildScripts/build/build.js
scripts.build-client-prod: npm run build-build && env-cmd -e prod node ./buildScripts/build/buildClient.js
scripts.build-server-prod: npm run build-build && env-cmd -e prod node ./buildScripts/build/buildServer.js
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-build && env-cmd -e prod node ./buildScripts/build/build.js
scripts.start: npm run build-build && concurrently -n "ui ,api" -c "cyan,blue" "npm run watch-client-dev" "npm run watch-server-dev"
scripts.start-server-dev: npm run build-server-dev && env-cmd -e dev node ./build/server/out.js
scripts.start-all: npm run build-build && npm run build-api-builder && concurrently -n "builder, ui ,api" -c "green, cyan,blue" "npm run watch-test-components-build" "npm run watch-client-dev" "npm run watch-server-dev"
